mapper.sql: sysDict.id, sysDict.dict_type_code, sysDict.dict_type_name, sysDict.dict_name, sysDict.dict_code, sysDict.dict_sort, sysDict.delete_at, sysDict.gmt_create, sysDict.gmt_modify
mapper.select: select sysDict.dict_type_code, sysDict.dict_type_name, sysDict.dict_name, sysDict.dict_code from sys_dict sysDict where sysDict.delete_at = 0 and sysDict.dict_type_code = #{dictTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sysDict.dict_type_code, sysDict.dict_sort, sysDict.gmt_modify desc
